summary: In 1895, British archaeologists find and open the tomb of Egyptian Princess Ananka with nefarious consequences.
cast: Peter Cushing|Christopher Lee|Yvonne Furneaux|Eddie Byrne|Felix Aylmer|Raymond Huntley|George Pastell|Michael Ripper|George Woodbridge|Harold Goodwin|Denis Shaw|Gerald Lawson|Willoughby Gray|John Stuart|David Browning|Frank Sieman|Stanley Meadows|Frank Singuineau|Ernest Blyth|James Clarke|John Harrison|Frederick Rawlings|George Spence|Roy Stewart
title: La momia
